revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DAP-2360 |revision=A1 |upc=790069345746 |asin=B004RJJHLI |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model=WAP-N08 |manuf_rev= |availability= |fcc_date=10/12/2010 |fcc_id=KA2AP2360A1 |ic_id=4216A-AP2360A1 |pcb_id=8WAPN08.2A1G |type=access point |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7242 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128BVFG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6AB160TSA-5G |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9283 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=dlink |default_ssid_regex=^dlink$ |default_ip=192.168.0.50 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|AirPremier N PoE Access Point with Plenum-rated Chassis}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=D-Link|model=DAP-2360}}
"8WAPN08..2A1G" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :Per the manual, the default SSID is '''dlink'''.
;Revision A1: * CPU: [[Atheros]] AR7242-AH1A (MIPS 24K 32-bit @400MHz) * Flash: [[Winbond]] W25Q128BVFG (16MB) * Memory: M13S5121632A-5TG2S @200MHz (DDR400 64MB) * WiFi: [[Atheros]] AR9283 2x2 MIMO 802.11n (2.4GHz) * Ethernet: [[Atheros]] AR8021 (Gigabit, but seems CPU can handle :only 100Mb, don't know how is connected to CPU)
;Backdoor: # connect to telnet service # authorize using your login and password # enter secret command "alpha sdd21234" # enter secret command "shell" # Welcome to root access!
